title: Course for Strengthening Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies Through Online Case-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: An online course utilizing real-time video conferencing tools and digital devices, with goals of strengthening math education design and leadership capabilities.

learning_goals: Analyze real corporate cases to develop mathematical problem-solving strategies applicable at over 80% proficiency
Explain at least three strategies for inducing learner attitude changes in math education design through case-based learning (CBL)
Improve the instructional design case based on peer feedback to achieve a score of 75 or above (out of 100) in the final submission

resources: Real-Time Collaboration Platforms (Google Docs, Jamboard, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
